headline: Apple most immune to memory price rises, others more impacted: Bernstein
summary: Investing.com -- Apple is the best-positioned major hardware maker to weather the sharp surge in memory prices, according to Bernstein, which says the company faces only a “0.3% impact to quarterly EPS” despite historic cost inflation across the industry.

content.title: Apple most immune to memory price rises, others more impacted: Bernstein
